owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Open Risk (https://www.openriskmanagement.com)
owl:Ontology.dc:description:
The Non Performing Loan ontology, described using W3C RDF Schema and the Web Ontology Language OWL.
NPLO aims to conform as closely as possible to the published European Banking Authority NPL Data Templates
Release Notes: - Version 0.1 Defines the main classes, object and data properties of the ontology
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Non Performing Loan Ontology (NPLO)
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The Non-Performing Loan Ontology is still in active development. Feedback, ideas, use cases are encouraged

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Fair Value Through P rofit and Loss
Other Accounting Standard â Impaired Asset
Other Accounting Standard â Not Impaired

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Accounting stages of asset quality, i.e. IFRS Stage 1, IFRS Stage 2, IFRS Stage 3 (impaired), Fair Value Through P&L, Other Accounting Standard â impaired asset, Other Accounting Standard â Not impaired
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_accounting_stages_of_asset_quality

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of interest that has been accrued but not capitalized to the Loan, as not recognized on the balance sheet
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_accrued_interest_balance_off_book

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current amount of outstanding interest as recognised on the balance sheet at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_accrued_interest_balance_on_book

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the guarantee has been activated when "Guarantee" is selected in field "Collateral Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_activation_of_guarantee

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Corporate Insolvency Procedures which also include funds
Corporate Restructuring Procedures which also include funds
Private Individual Counterparty Debt Compromise Procedures

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional name of any insolvency or restructuring proceedings to which the Counterparty is subject
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_additional_name_of_insolvencyorrestructuring_proceedings

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional indication of how advanced the relevant procedure has become as a result of various legal steps in the legal procedure having been completeted
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_additional_stage_reached_in_insolvencyorrestructuring_procedure

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Street address where the Property is located at, including flat / house number or name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_address_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Address where the Corporate Counterparty is registered, including flat / house number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_address_of_registered_location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Street address where the Private Individual Counterparty lives, including flat / house number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_address_of_residence

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Interest Only (IO) i.e. no amortisation with a bullet

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the Amortisation type of the loan as per the latest Loan Agreement
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_amortisation_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of accrued costs and fees paid by the receiver and to be invoiced to the Institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_amount_of_outstanding_liabilities

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional amount that the current agreed forbearance amount is increased by
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_amount_of_repayment_step_up

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of VAT payable on the disposal of the Unit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_amount_of_vat_payable

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of annual EBIT held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_annual_ebit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total annual income of the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_annual_income

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annual insurance payment to be paid by receiver
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_annual_insurance_payment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of annual revenue held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_annual_revenue

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Area type where the Property is located at , i.e. City centre, Suburban and Rural
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_area_type_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether there is an obligation for the Borrower to purchase the Collateral at the end of the lease
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_asset_purchase_obligation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The Balance that was sent to the External Debt Collection Agent
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_balance_amount_sent_to_agent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Balance of the Loan when the Loan has defaulted (CRR Art.178)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_balance_at_default

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Financial reporting practice the Corporate Counterparty has adopted
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_basis_of_financial_statements

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Building area (square metres) of the Unit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_building_area_m2

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Building area (square metres) of the Unit that is lettable
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_building_area_m2_lettable

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Building area (square metres) of the Unit that has been occupied by landlord / tenant
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_building_area_m2_occupied

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the business operations of the Corporate Counterparty, providing more detail for field "Industry Segment"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_business_description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total capitalised past-due balance as recognised on balance sheet at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date i.e. Interest and Legal Fees
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_capitalised_pastdue_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of cash and cash equivalent items held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_cash_and_cash_equivalent_items

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total cash recoveries collected by the external collection agent
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_cash_recoveries

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Channel through which the Loan was originated, i.e. Branch, Internet and Broker
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_channel_of_origination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date when the Loan went into charge-off. A charge-off is the declaration by the Institution commonly on Unsecured Retail when the Borrower is severely delinquent, and the Institution starts the recovery process officially.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_chargeoff_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: City where the Property is located at
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_city_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: City where the Corporate Counterparty is registered
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_city_of_registered_location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: City where the Private Individual Counterparty lives
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_city_of_residence

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether a clause exists to allow the Institution to stop the current forbearance
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_clause_to_stop_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Loan is subject to certain Code of Conduct
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_code_of_conduct

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether there is an insurance on the Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_collateral_insurance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount that the collateral insurance covers
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_collateral_insurance_coverage_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the collateral is repossessed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_collateral_repossessed_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Physical type of the Collateral, e.g. Guarantee and Machinery
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_collateral_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Counterparty commenced Insolvency / Restructuring Proceedings
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_commencement_date_of_insolvency_or_restructuring_proceedings

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details on Code of Conduct
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_comments_on_code_of_conduct

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details on the covenant waiver if "Yes" is selected in field "Covenant Waiver"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_comments_on_covenant_waiver

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details if there is other litigation processes in place
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_comments_on_other_litigation_related_process

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the construction of the Unit is complete
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_completion_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specification and option list of the Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_configuration

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Corporate Counterparty has contingent obligations which will be part of the sale, e.g. the Institution provided a guarantee to a real estate developer on their development
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_contingent_obligations

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Correspondence address of appointed insolvency practitioner
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_correspondence_address_of_appointed_insolvency_practitioner

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total amount of costs accrued for external collection as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_costs_accrued

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total costs accrued to the seller at end of sale process
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_costs_at_end_of_sale

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Private Individual Counterparty has passed away
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_counterparty_deceased

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country where the Loan was originated
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_country_of_origination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country where the Corporate Counterparty is registered
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_country_of_registered_location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country where the Private Individual Counterparty resides
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_country_of_residence

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Court appraisal amount of the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_court_appraisal_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the auction process
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_court_auction_identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Court set reserve price for first auction, i.e. minimum price required by the court
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_court_auction_reserve_price_for_first_auction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Court set reserve price for last auction, i.e. minimum price required by the court
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_court_auction_reserve_price_for_last_auction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Court set reserve price for next auction, i.e. minimum price required by the court
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_court_auction_reserve_price_for_next_auction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether there has been a covenant waiver sent out for any breaches of the Loan Agreement
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_covenant_waiver

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether all / some of the loans held by the Counterparty are secured by all / some of the collaterals held by the Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_cross_collateralisation_for_counterparty

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether all / some of the loans in the Counterparty Group are secured by all / some of the collaterals within the Counterparty Group ("Full", "Partial", "None")
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_cross_collateralisation_in_counterparty_group

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether contractual breach of any loans held by the Counterparty would trigger the default event of any other loans
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_cross_default_for_counterparty

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The indicator as to whether Contractual breach of any loans in the Counterparty Group would trigger the contractual default event of the other loans. ("Full", "Partial", "none")
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_cross_default_in_counterparty_group

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency that the annual income of the Private Individual Counterparty is expressed in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_currency_of_annual_income

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency that the valuation and cash flows related to the Collateral are expressed in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_currency_of_collateral

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency that the deposit held with the Institution is expressed in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_currency_of_deposit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency that the items related to enforcement are expressed in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_currency_of_enforcement

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency that the latest available financial statements are expressed in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_currency_of_financial_statements

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency that the valuation and cash flows related to the Unit are expressed in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_currency_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current annual passing rent charged to the Tenants of the Unit as at latest valuation date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_annual_passing_rent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of current assets held by the Corporate Counterparty, excluding cash and cash equivalent items as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_assets

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country that the Collateral is currently registered in as at cut-off date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_country_of_registration

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current levels of covenants as at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_covenant_levels

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: External credit rating issued for the Loan at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date. In case several ratings are assigned, the approach described in Art. 138 of the CRR applies.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_external_credit_rating

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: External credit scoring issued to the Private Individual Counterparty at cut-off date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_external_credit_scoring

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current base rate of the Loan as at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date when "Variable" is selected in field "Current Interest Rate Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_interest_base_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The current margin above the base rate as stated in the Loan Agreement and applicable at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_interest_margin

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The current total interest rate of the loan as stated in the Loan Agreement on and applicable at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_interest_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current interest rate base or reference of the loan as stated in the Loan Agreement and applicable at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date when âVariableâ is selected in field âCurrent Interest Rate Typeâ
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_interest_rate_reference

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The current interest rate type as per Loan Agreement and applicable at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date, i.e. Fixed / Variable / Mixed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_interest_rate_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Internal credit rating issued to the Loan at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date and please provide the internal methodology used to decide the rating as a part of the transaction documents
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_internal_credit_rating

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Off the market is when the collateral is not marketed or up for sale
On the market is when the collateral is advertised and marketed for sale

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current market status of the Property / Collateral as at cut-off date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_market_status

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contractual maturity date of the Loan as at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_maturity_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current annual net operating income generated by the Unit as at the latest valuation date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_net_operating_income

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current annual operational expenses and overheads of running the Collateral as at cut-off date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_opex_and_overheads

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current level of reversion interest rate according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date, reversion means that after the interest fixed period the Institution would revert the rate to a different type, e.g. the Institution's Standard Variable Rate
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_current_reversion_interest_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the next insurance payment is due
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_next_insurance_payment_is_due

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the insolvency practitioner was appointed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_appointment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of birth of the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_birth

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the court appraisal happened
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_court_appraisal

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that a demand notice was sent by solicitors who act on behalf of the Institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_external_demand_issuance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the first forbearance happened
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_first_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Corporate Counterparty was incorporated as a company, partnership or fund, and therefore became a separate legal entity from its owners, with its own rights and obligations
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_incorporation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date at which the initial valuation was assessed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_initial_valuation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that a demand notice was sent by the Institution itself
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_internal_demand_issuance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of last direct contact with the Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_last_contact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of the latest available Financial Statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_latest_annual_financial_statements

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the latest valuation took place
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_latest_valuation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Order for Possession is granted by the court
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_obtaining_order_for_possession

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Loan originated as per the Loan Agreement
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_origination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the principal forgiveness happened
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_principal_forgiveness

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the receiver was appointed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_receiver_appointment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date at which the current agreed forbearance amount is increased
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_repayment_step_up

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the latest residual value of the Collateral was assessed, residual value refers to how much the Collateral will be worth at end of the loan term
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_the_latest_residual_valuation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the personal details of the Private Individual Counterparty, i.e. nationality, residence, annual income and occupation in the above fields, were last verified
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_of_verification_for_personal_details

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Loan was received back from the external collection agent, i.e. when the agent stopped recovery efforts and passed the Loan back to the Institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_returned_from_agent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Loan was sent to the external collection agent
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_sent_to_agent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Reservation of Rights Letter was issued by the Institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_date_when_reservation_of_rights_letter_was_issued

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of days that the Loan is currently past-due as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_days_in_pastdue

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional margin charged on the balance of the Loan in default according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_default_penalty_interest_margin

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Deposit amount the Counterparty holds with the Institution as defined by annex II, Part two of the ECB BSI Regulation
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_deposit_balance_with_institution

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed description of the collateral. Country specific for Spain - please see instructions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the bespoke repayment profile when "Bespoke Repayment" is selected in field "Amortisation Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_bespoke_repayment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of contingent obligations when "Yes" is selected in field "Contingent Obligations"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_contingent_obligations

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of cross collateralisation when "Partial" is selected in field "Cross Collateralisation for Counterparty"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_cross_collateralisation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of cross default when "Partial" is selected in field "Cross Default for Counterparty"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_cross_default

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of current interest rate type when "Mixed" is selected in field "Current Interest Rate Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_current_interest_rate_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details on the current forbearance
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the legal procedure type when 'Other' is selected in the data field 'Legal Procedure Type'
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_legal_procedure_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of original interest rate type when "Mixed" is selected in field "Original Interest Rate Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_original_interest_rate_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details on the nature of the relation between the institution and the related party when "Yes" is selected in field "Related Party"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_related_party

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the relevant scheme if 'Yes' is selected in the field 'Relevant Schemes'
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_relevant_schemes

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description and related narrative on the Sponsor
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_sponsor

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details on the clause if "Yes" is selected in field "Clause to Stop Forbearance"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_description_of_the_forbearance_clause

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the origination channel when "Broker" or "Other" is selected in field "Channel of Origination"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_details_of_origination_channel

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether a distribution has been made to the seller
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_distribution_made_to_the_seller

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional charge on the early redemption made by the Counterparty according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_early_redemption_penalty

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the deposit held with the Institution can be used to pay down the loan
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_eligibility_for_deposit_to_offset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Employment status of the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_employment_status

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the current fixed interest period ends according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_end_date_of_current_fixed_interest_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the current forbearance arrangement ends
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_end_date_of_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the interest payment ends postponement according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_end_date_of_interest_grace_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the interest repayment only period ends according to the current Loan Agreement and applicable as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_end_date_of_interest_only_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the principal payment ends postponement according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_end_date_of_principal_grace_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the current subsidy ends
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_end_date_of_subsidy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Comments or description of the stage of enforcement
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_enforcement_description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Status of the enforcement process that the Collateral is currently in as at cut-off date, e.g. if it is in receivership
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_enforcement_status

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether any other secured creditors have taken steps to enforce security over the asset? (Y/N)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_enforcement_status_third_parties

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional costs to "Current Opex And Overheads" when the Units are vacant
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_estimated_annual_void_cost

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Estimated number of months the property is expected to be void
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_estimated_rental_void

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Estimated remaining useful life as at cut-off date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_estimated_useful_life

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the Counterparty is evicted
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_eviction_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: External credit rating issued to the Loan applicable at the point of time when the counterparty became a customer. In case several ratings are assigned, the approach described in Art. 138 of the CRR applies.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_external_credit_rating_at_origination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: External credit scoring issued to the Private Individual Counterparty at loan origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_external_credit_scoring_at_origination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annual fees charged by the receiver
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_fees_of_receivership

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total amount of principal repayment to be paid at the maturity date of the loan
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_final_bullet_repayment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the financial statements have been prepared at the Consolidated or at the Counterparty level
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_financial_statements_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the financial statements have been audited or not by the Corporate Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_financials_audited

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the first auction has been performed in order to sell the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_first_auction_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of fixed assets held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_fixed_assets

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the funds were remitted fully
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_funds_remitted_full_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the funds were remitted partially
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_funds_remitted_partial_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: NUTS3 classification used for the field "Geographic Region of Property", i.e. NUTS3 2013 (1), NUTS3 2010 (2), NUTS3 2006 (3), NUTS3 2003 (4), Other (5)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_geographic_region_classification

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Province / Region where the Property is located at
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_geographic_region_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Province or Region where the Corporate Counterparty is registered
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_geographic_region_of_registered_location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Province / Region where the Private Individual Counterparty lives
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_geographic_region_of_residence

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Governing law is the law of the country in which the Loan Agreement was entered into. This does not necessarily correspond to the country where the loan was originated
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_governing_law_of_loan_agreement

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gross sale proceeds, i.e. sales proceeds and costs incurred from the disposal
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_gross_sale_proceeds

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Claim amount of the guarantee when "Guarantee" is selected in field "Collateral Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_guarantee_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Private Individual Counterparty has self-certified their annual income
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_income_selfcertified

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Corporate or Private Individual Counterparty is cooperative or not
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_indicator_of_counterparty_cooperation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Enforcement process has been entered into by a Corporate or Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_indicator_of_enforcement

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Corporate or Private Individual Counterparty is in Receivership
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_indicator_of_receivership

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Industry in which the Corporate Counterparty mainly operates
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_industry_segment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Industry in which the Counterparty Group mainly operates
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_industry_segment_of_counterparty_group

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Estimated annual gross rental value of the Unit assessed at loan origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_initial_estimated_rental_value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date at which the initial residual value of the Collateral was assessed, residual value refers to how much the Collateral will be worth at end of the loan term
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_initial_residual_valuation_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Estimated residual value of the Collateral at loan origination, residual value refers to how much the Collateral will be worth at end of the loan term
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_initial_residual_value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Value of the Collateral assessed at loan origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_initial_valuation_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether an insolvency practitioner has been appointed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_insolvency_practitioner_appointed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the receiver has insured the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_insurance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Maximum interest rate which can be charged on the Loan as specified in the current Loan Agreement (if applicable)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_interest_cap_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Minimum interest rate of a loan which can be charged on the Loan as specified in the current Loan Agreement (if applicable)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_interest_floor_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Frequency of interest payments based on the current Loan Agreement as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_interest_payment_frequency

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Interest rate that the Institution and Counterparty agreed under the current forbearance terms
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_interest_rate_under_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of months between two interest reset dates according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_interest_reset_interval

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Internal credit rating issued to the Loan applicable at the point of time when the counterparty became a customer and please provide the internal methodology used to decide the rating as a part of the transaction documents
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_internal_credit_rating_at_origination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the initial valuation was outsourced, or done internally
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_internal_or_external_initial_valuation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the latest valuation was performed internally or by an external appraiser
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_internal_or_external_latest_valuation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Location of the court where the case is being heard in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_jurisdiction_of_court

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Land area (square metres) of the Property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_land_area_m2

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the last auction was performed in order to sell the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_last_auction_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the covenant levels were tested last time by the institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_last_covenant_test_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the last interest reset event happened
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_last_interest_reset_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the last payment was made
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_last_payment_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Estimated annual gross rental value of the Unit when last assessed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_latest_estimated_rental_value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Estimated residual value of the Collateral when last assessed, residual value refers to how much the Collateral will be worth at end of the loan term
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_latest_residual_value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Value of the Collateral when last assessed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_latest_valuation_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total claim amount, i.e. Total Balance + Accrued Interest Balance (Off book)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_legal_balance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Balance of the Loan when the Loan has defaulted (CRR Art.178)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_legal_balance_at_chargeoff_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Global standard 20-character corporate identifier of the Corporate Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_legal_entity_identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total amount of legal fees accrued at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_legal_fees_accrued

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Corporate Insolvency Procedures which also include funds
Corporate Restructuring Procedures which also include funds
Private Individual Counterparty Debt Compromise Procedures

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of insolvency or restructuring process the counterparty is currently in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_legal_procedure_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total available credit extended as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_loan_commitment

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR) is the ratio of annual net operating income to debt obligations owed in the last 12m
Interest Coverage Ratio (ICR) is the ratio of earnings before interest and tax to the interest expense in the same period
Loan to Value (LTV) is the ratio of a loan to the value of the collateral purchased

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: List of the covenants as agreed in the current Loan Agreement as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date (LTV, ICR, DSCR etc.), each in a separate column
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_loan_covenants

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Currency which the Loan is expressed in as per latest Loan Agreement
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_loan_currency

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Margin lending where the Counterparty borrows money to invest in shares or managed funds
Residential real estate â owner occupied

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Ultimate financing purpose of the Loan
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_loan_purpose

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Non-performing as defined in table F18 in Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Loan status, e.g. performing and non-performing
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_loan_status

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name used to refer to the manufacturer of the Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_manufacturer_of_collateral

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Market capitalisation of a listed Corporate Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_market_capitalisation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Institution operates a Mortgage Arrears Resolution Process when dealing with Corporates or Private Individual Counterparties in Mortgage Arrears
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_marp_applicable

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date loan entered current MARP status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_marp_entry

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The status of the current Mortgage Arrears Resolution Process; Not in MARP, Exited MARP, Provision 23,24,28,29,42,45,47,Self Cure, Alternative Repayment Arrangement (ARA)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_marp_status

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name used to refer to the Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_name_of_counterparty

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name used to refer to the Counterparty Group
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_name_of_counterparty_group

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the external collection agent
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_name_of_external_debt_collection_agent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of any insolvency or restructuring proceedings to which the Counterparty is subject
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_name_of_insolvencyorrestructuring_proceedings

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of legal firm acting on behalf of the Institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_name_of_legal_firm

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name used to refer to the main decision maker / key individual in relation to the Counterparty Group
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_name_of_sponsor

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Main nationality of the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_nationality_of_counterparty

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of net assets held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_net_assets

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Condition of the Collateral at loan origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_new_or_used

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the next intended auction has been performed in order to sell the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_next_auction_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the next interest reset event happened
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_next_interest_reset_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of next scheduled interest repayment as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_next_interest_scheduled_repayment_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the next interest repayment is made as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_next_interest_scheduled_repayment_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of next scheduled principal repayment as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_next_principal_scheduled_repayment_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the next principal repayment is made as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_next_principal_scheduled_repayment_date

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Defaulted as defined by CRR Art. 178
Impaired as defined by IFRS 9.5.5 or the applicable accounting standard

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Main reason why the non-performing status was provided, i.e. impaired (according to the applicable accounting standard), defaulted (CRR Art. 178), more than 90 DPD, unlikely to pay
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_nonperforming_reason

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the notice of the end of the procedure has been given to the seller
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_notice_for_procedure_termination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of bedrooms that the Unit has
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_bedrooms

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of car parking spaces relating to the Unit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_car_parking_spaces

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of outstanding Court Enforcement Orders at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date against the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_current_judgements

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of discharged Court Enforcement Orders against the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_discharged_judgements

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of failed previous auctions for the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_failed_auctions

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of full-time employees (or equivalent) working for the Corporate Counterparty as at the last financial reporting date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_fte

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of forbearance(s) that happened in the past
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_historical_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of joint Counterparties who jointly own parts of the Loan.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_joint_counterparties

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of lettable units that the Property has
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_lettable_units

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of times that the Loan was previously categorised as past-due
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_pastdue_events

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of rooms that the Unit has excluding kitchen and bathroom(s)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_rooms

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of occupied lettable units that the Property has
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_units_occupied

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of vacant lettable units that the Property has
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_number_of_units_vacant

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the occupation of the Private Individual Counterparty, providing more detail for field "Occupation Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_occupation_description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Main occupation of the Private Individual Counterparty, where (a), (b), (c) or (d) is selected in the field 'Employment Status'
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_occupation_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The highest price offered by potential buyers
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_offer_price

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Price of the Property / Collateral for which it is on the market
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_on_market_price

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount the Borrower will pay at the end of the lease in order to take ownership of the Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_option_to_buy_price

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country that the Collateral was originally registered in
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_country_of_registration

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original base rate of the Loan when "Variable" is selected in field "Original Interest Rate Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_interest_base_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original margin above the base rate at loan origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_interest_margin

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original total interest rate of the Loan as states in the Loan Agreement and as applicable as of Loan Origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_interest_rate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original interest rate base / reference of the Loan when "Variable" is selected in field "Original Interest Rate Type"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_interest_rate_reference

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original interest rate type as states in the Loan Agreement and as applicable as of Loan origination i.e. Fixed / Variable / Mixed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_interest_rate_type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original contractual maturity date of the Loan
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_original_maturity_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Loan amount advanced to the Borrower / drawn down by the Borrower at the origination date on the loan
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_origination_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current amount of other outstanding amounts, e.g. other charges, commissions, fees etc., as recognised on the balance sheet
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_other_balances

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Further comments / details if there is other proceedings in place
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_other_ongoing_enforcement_proceedings

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Accumulated amount of other past-due amounts, e.g. fees, as recognised on balance sheet at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_other_pastdue_amounts

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Other products that the Counterparty holds with the Institution that are not included in the NPL Portfolio
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_other_products_with_institution

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Party who is liable to pay the VAT on the disposal of the Unit i.e. the Institution or the buyer(s)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_party_liable_for_vat

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Accumulated amount of past-due interest as recognised on balance sheet as at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_pastdue_interest_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Additional margin charged on the past-due portion of the Loan according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_pastdue_penalty_interest_margin

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Accumulated amount of past-due principal as recognised on balance sheet at NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_pastdue_principal_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The percentage of development completed since construction started (applicable to Units in development)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_percentage_complete

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique external identifier assigned to the Private Individual Counterparty
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_personal_identity_number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current planned CAPEX for the next 12 months
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_planned_capex_next_12m

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Postcode where the Corporate Counterparty is registered
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_postcode_of_registered_location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Postcode where the Private Individual Counterparty lives
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_postcode_of_residence

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current amount of outstanding principal as recognised on the balance sheet at Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_principal_balance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of the principal that was forgiven by the external collection agent as part of recovery negotiations
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_principal_forgiveness

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Frequency that the principal payment is currently made based on the current Loan Agreement as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_principal_payment_frequency

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Proof of Claim Filed by the seller
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_proof_of_claim_filed_by_the_seller

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country of residence where the Property is located at
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_property_country

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Postcode where the Property is located at
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_property_postcode

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the external appraiser or managing / estate agent when "Full Appraisal" or "Managing / Estate Agent" is selected in field "Type of Latest Valuation". If the valuation was done internally, please select "Internal"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_provider_of_latest_valuation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of times the at the Loan was received back from the external debt collection agent
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_quantity_returned_from_agent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Institution has the legal right to access other assets of the Borrower
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_recourse_to_other_assets

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company registration number of the external collection agent according to the registration with the country specific registration office
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_registration_number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Counterparty is a related party to the Institution, e.g. Counterparty is an employee of the Institution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_related_party

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Loan is involved with any relevant schemes, e.g. Right to Buy Scheme in UK
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_relevant_schemes

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Remaining term of the leasehold when "Leasehold" is selected in field "Tenure"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_remaining_term_of_leasehold

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Periodic repayment amount that the Institution and Counterparty agreed under the current forbearance terms
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_repayment_amount_under_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Frequency that the repayment under current forbearance terms is made
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_repayment_frequency_under_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether a repayment plan has been agreed with the external collection agency
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_repayment_plan

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the repayment plan which has been agreed with the external collection agency
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_repayment_plan_description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Agreed price for the disposal of the Property / Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_sale_agreed_price

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Sector which the property is used for, e.g. commercial real estate, residential real estate, etc.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_sector_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Loan has been securitised or within covered bond pool
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_securitised

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that sheriff / bailiff is acquired by the court
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_sheriff_or_bailiff_acquisition_date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Loan is a specialised product, e.g. Fractioned Loans in Italy
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_specialised_product

rdf:Description.rdf:first: A bar date for claims has been issued
A creditors committee has been formed
A distribution has been made to secured creditors
A distribution has been made to unsecured creditors
A moratorium against enforcement is in place
A notice of intention to sell secured assets has been given
A notice of the end of the procedure has been given
A proof of claim has been filed
A restructuring plan has been approved
A restructuring plan has been proposed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the current fixed interest period started according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_start_date_of_current_fixed_interest_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the current forbearance arrangement starts
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_start_date_of_forbearance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the interest payment starts being postponed according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_start_date_of_interest_grace_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the interest repayment only period starts according to the most recent Loan Agreement and applicable as the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_start_date_of_interest_only_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the principal payment starts being postponed according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_start_date_of_principal_grace_period

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date that the current subsidy starts
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_start_date_of_subsidy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator where contractual payments are subsidised by an external party
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_subsidy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the external party who provided the subsidy
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_subsidy_provider

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the Loan is provided by a syndicate or consortium of two or more institutions. This means that in the case of a syndicated loan the Institution holds less than 100% of the total loan
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_syndicated_loan

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Percentage of the portion held by the Institution when "Yes" is selected in field "Syndicated Loan"
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_syndicated_portion

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Conditions that the Property is held or occupied, e.g. freehold and leasehold
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_tenure

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total number of months that the Loan has been in past-due in the past 12 months
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_time_in_pastdue

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of total assets held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_total_assets

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total unpaid balance, i.e. Principal Balance + Accrued Interest Balance (On book) + Other Balances
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_total_balance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of total debt held by the Corporate Counterparty as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_total_debt

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amount of total liabilities held by the Corporate Counterparty on the balance sheet as defined by the applicable accounting standard as per the latest available financial statements
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_total_liabilities

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total past-due amount, i.e. Past-Due Principal Amount + Past-Due Interest Amount + Other Past-Due Amount
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_total_pastdue_amount

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Corresponding trigger levels as agreed in the Loan Agreement, as at the NPL Portfolio Cut-Off Date, each in a separate column
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_trigger_levels_of_loan_covenants

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Capitalisation of costs advanced: which is insurance and ground rent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the external collections have been prepared on a Counterparty level or on a Loan Level
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the latest valuation for the Collateral
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_latest_valuation

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Listed Corporate is a Corporate entity whose shares are quoted and traded on a Stock Exchange
Listed Fund is a fund whose shares are quoted and traded on a Stock exchange
Partnership is where the Sponsor constitutes a group of individuals who form a legal partnership where profits and liabilities are shared
Unlisted Corporate is a Corporate entity whose shares are not quoted and traded on a stock exchange
Unlisted Fund is a fund whose shares are not quoted and traded on a Stock exchange

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the legal owner, i.e. Private Individual, Listed Corporate, Unlisted Corporate and Partnership
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_legal_owner

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Partially owner-occupied Defined as a property that is partly rented

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of occupancy, i.e. owner occupied, tenanted, not tenanted
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_occupancy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the personal identity number entered in field "Personal Identity Number", e.g. National Insurance Number, Passport Number, National Tax Number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_personal_identity_number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the Property, e.g. Apartment, Semi Detached House, Terraced House, Land, etc.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of reversion interest rate after the fixed interest period according to the Loan Agreement and applicable as of the NPL Portfolio Cur-Off Date, reversion means that after the interest fixed period the Institution would revert the rate to a different type, e.g. the Institution's Standard Variable Rate
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_reversion_interest_rate

rdf:Description.rdf:first: Listed Corporate is a Corporate entity whose shares are quoted and traded on a Stock Exchange
Listed Fund is a fund whose shares are quoted and traded on a Stock exchange
Partnership is where the Sponsor constitutes a group of individuals who form a legal partnership where profits and liabilities are shared
Unlisted Corporate is a Corporate entity whose shares are not quoted and traded on a stock exchange
Unlisted Fund is a fund whose shares are not quoted and traded on a Stock exchange

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of entity the sponsor is i.e. Listed Corporate, Unlisted Corporate, Listed Fund, Unlisted Fund and High Net Worth Individual
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_type_of_sponsor

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Value stated on Energy Performance Certificate
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_value_of_energy_performance_certificate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicator as to whether the VAT is payable on the disposal of the Unit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_vat_payable

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Year that the Property was completed and refurbished
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_year_of_construction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Year that the Collateral was manufactured / first sold
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_year_of_manufacture

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Year in which the last significantly refurbished was completed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_year_of_refurbishment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Year that the Collateral was registered
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has_year_of_registration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Borrower Class. A sub-class of Counterparty that applies to Lending relations
Corporate Borrower Class. A sub-class of Borrower that applies to Corporations
General Counterparty Class (not necessarily to a credit contract)
Individual Borrower Class. A sub-class of Borrower that applies to Individuals
